title: Apparel Product Manager-Asia Pacific-Shanghai - Sports Equipment
text: Posted/Updated: 10-21-2015 Brief Job Description: Working closely with global creation team and act as the product expert for Asia Pacific apparel & accessories business. Provide consumer insight and ensure that AP regional product ...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
